Html:
I receive this error when using phpExcel, I am getting my data from an sql db and it was previously working and I now get this error.

PHP Fatal error: Allowed memory size of 134217728 bytes exhausted (tried to allocate 648 bytes) in C:\Public\AllWeb\IMIDB\Classes\PHPExcel\Cell\DefaultValueBinder.php on line 75

Any thoughts or suggestions.

We are aware of the problem. Meanwhile, please raise memory limit:
http://www.codeplex.com/PHPExcel/Thread/View.aspx?ThreadId=36847
